doc.plot: Diego Granados is a known journalist in Colombia; chasing a story he is kidnapped by FARC the biggest guerrilla group in the country and held captive in the mountains for several months. During his captive days he experiences the company of two others kidnapped who share the same faith. Between the hostile days, the silence and the uncertainty of a country in the middle of war Diego Granados would come to finish his final story, his own.
